title: When We Were Bright And Beautiful Book Club
itunes:title: When We Were Bright And Beautiful Book Club
description:
This week we’re discussing our October Book Club Pick: When We Were Bright and Beautiful by Jillian Medoff. We talk about the theories we had while reading this book, what we did and didn’t like, our thoughts on the ending, and play two calls from listeners sharing their thoughts. 

Content Warning: In this episode, we discuss the book's plotlines surrounding sexual assault & pedophilia, so if these themes may be upsetting to you, please take care and skip this episode and join us next week. 

 

National Sexual Assault Hotline: Confidential 24/7 Support

Chat online at online.rainn.org

Call at 800-656-4673

 

Obsessions

Olivia: Maintenance Phase 

Becca: Purple Anthropologie Coat

 

What we read this week!

Becca: When We Were Bright and Beautiful by Jillian Medoff, The ARC by Tory Henwood Hoen

Olivia: The Face on the Milk Carton by Caroline B. Cooney

 

November’s Book Club Pick: The Cloisters by Katy Hays 

 

Sponsors:

ZocDoc - Go to Zocdoc.com/BOP and download the ZocDoc app for free and start your search for a top-rated doctor today. 

Uncommon Goods - To get 15% off your next gift, go to uncommongoods.com/BOP.

Better Help - Save 10% off your first month at betterhelp.com/badonpaper. 

 

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more! 

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Olivia on Instagram @oliviamuenter and Becca @beccamfreeman.
